headline: Equinix (EQIX) Beats Q1 FFO and Revenue Estimates
summary: Equinix (EQIX) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 7.92% and 0.42%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Equinix (EQIX) Beats Q1 FFO and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Equinix (EQIX) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 7.92% and 0.42%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Equinix raises annual revenue, FFO forecasts on robust demand
summary: The U.S. digital infrastructure company benefited from steady spending by hyperscalers who rent data centers and other services.  Smaller enterprises have been showing momentum in spending across industries that depend on data center services to expand their digitization initiatives, hyping demand for companies like Equinix.  Demand for its digital infrastructure and services remains robust with customer momentum across a full breadth of geographies, industries, segments and products prompting it to raise its forecast, Equinix said.

headline: Equinix: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $8.96 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.

raw.headline: Equinix: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $8.96 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.

headline: Equinix Declares Quarterly Dividend on Its Common Stock
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $4.69 per share on its common stock. The quarterly common stock dividend will be paid on June 18, 2025, to shareholders of record on May 21, 2025.

headline: Equinix Reports First-Quarter 2025 Results
summary: Quarterly revenues of $2.2 billion, an increase of 5% over the same quarter last year as-reported, or 8% on a normalized and constant currency basis, excluding the impact of power pass-through

raw.headline: Equinix Reports First-Quarter 2025 Results
